name: Buddies Breakout
description:
Your squad has been captured and is being held in a nightclub complex.

No time for slacking: get in, save them, get out.

Beware of the clubbers, they're numerous and violent. Be stealthy and take advantage of your environment. The squad members you'll save might also be helpful to rescue the others.

==========================================================

In this Hotline-Miami inspired game, gameplay is diverse! Crouch to avoid detection and silently backstab ennemies, or run into them like a maniac and try to stay alive! But be careful, some obstacles will only hide you if you are sneaking.
